useCase.name: Create New User
useCase.trigger: Admin initiates creation of a new user

mainSequence.step: Admin requests data (first name, last name, email, password, password confirmation, phone number, user type) from EletricGo
Admin provides data (first name, last name, email, password, password confirmation, phone number, user type) to EletricGo
EletricGo shows data and asks for confirmation
EletricGo informs the success of the operation to Admin
